site_name: 16A Wyndham Road And 166168170172174176 And 176A Camberwell RoadLondonSE5
description: Details of condition 10 noise assessment of sound insulation between residential units and commercial units pursuant to planning permission for 17/AP/0528: Variations to Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of planning permission 14/AP/0175 for: Redevelopment of the site including demolition of existing buildings and erection of a residential-led mixed use scheme comprising five new buildings (Block 07: 9 storey, Block 08: 6 storey, Block 9: 4 storey, Block 10: 4 storey, Block 11: 5 storey) containing 82 flats, 222sqm new retail floorspace (class A1 use) and 616sqm of artists studios and associated gallery space (Class B1/D1 use), provision of 7 disabled parking spaces, cycle storage, refuse storage and associated landscaping. (PARTIAL DISCHARGE)
